test.name: distinct_count_aggregation_comparison
test.query: SELECT uniqExact(Title), uniqExact(Title BY UserID % {group_scale}), uniqExact(Title TOTALS) FROM hits_100m_obfuscated GROUP BY CounterID, UserID % {group_scale} FORMAT Null

SELECT uniqExact(Title) OVER (PARTITION BY CounterID, UserID % {group_scale}), uniqExact(Title) OVER (PARTITION BY UserID % {group_scale}), uniqExact(Title) OVER () FROM hits_100m_obfuscated FORMAT Null
SELECT uniqExact(Title) FROM hits_100m_obfuscated GROUP BY GROUPING SETS((CounterID, UserID % {group_scale}), (CounterID),()) FORMAT Null
